resources.string: Backup your wallet by recovery phrase
Recovery phrase is the only way to restore your wallet in case you lose your phone or forget your transaction password
Write down your recovery phrase carefully
Be sure to write these 12 words in correct order on paper and keep it safe and secure.
Some word isn’t correct. Try again
To make sure everything was written down correctly, please enter the word from recovery phrase
Enter recovery phrase to restore your wallet(%1$d/3)
To restore your wallet, please enter the word from recovery phrase
Those Passcodes didn\'t match. Try again.
An error has occurred.\nError code: %1$s\nIf restarting your phone doesn’t resolve the error, please contact HTC support. We apologize for the inconvenience.
An error has occurred.\nError code: %1$s\nPlease relaunch the application.
An error has occurred.\nError code: %1$s\nPlease clear Zion app data from Android settings and try again.
An error has occurred.\nError code: %1$s\nMake sure your 12-word recovery phrase is written down or that Social Key Recovery is up to date, then go to Zion settings to reset your wallet.
An error has occurred.\nError code: %1$s\nPlease restart your phone.
An error has occurred.\nError code: %1$s\nPlease contact HTC support.
An error has occurred.\nError code: %1$s\nThis feature is not available.
An error has occurred.\nError code: %1$s\nThe provided parameters are not valid.

An error has occurred.\nError code: %1$s\nYour transaction has been cancelled because the data you have entered does not match the information in your contract. This is a safety precaution. Please contact customer service.
You are trying too often, please try again in 10 minutes.
To protect your wallet from being hacked, we have suspend your wallet in this device.\nTo use wallet, you need to restore it by entering recovery phrase or social backup.
Enter PIN to unlock your wallet
This PIN code will be required for every transaction and open this app
This PIN code will be required for every transaction and unlock your wallet
These PIN codes didn\'t match. Try again
Are you sure to remove your trusted contact?
Are you sure to change PIN?
Are you sure to show recovery phrase?
Are you sure to reset wallet?
Enter PIN to reset your wallet
This will wipe all data and you will need your recovery phrase to restore your wallet
Enter PIN to generate verification code
Are you sure to use this account?
Your previous social backup can\'t be restore permanently.
Are you sure to log out?
Your previous social backup can\'t be restore permanently, if you log out this account
This will wipe all data and you will need your recovery phrase to restore your wallet.
